Class Config

java.lang.Object
application.util.Config
public final class Config extends Object
Central configuration constants for the entire game.

All game-tuning values are defined here so they can be changed in one place. No magic numbers are scattered throughout the codebase.

All fields are public static final for global immutable access. The class cannot be instantiated (utility class pattern).

    • BOARD_ROWS

      public static final int BOARD_ROWS
      Number of rows in the Tetris board.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BOARD_COLS

      public static final int BOARD_COLS
      Number of columns in the Tetris board.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CELL_SIZE

      public static final int CELL_SIZE
      Size of each cell in pixels when rendered on the Canvas.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • GAME_LOOP_TICK_MS

      public static final long GAME_LOOP_TICK_MS
      Game loop tick interval in milliseconds. Targeting approximately 60 FPS (16 ms per tick).
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INITIAL_GRAVITY_MS

      public static final long INITIAL_GRAVITY_MS
      Initial gravity interval in milliseconds. Determines how often the current piece auto-drops by one row. Decreases per stage for increasing difficulty.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • GRAVITY_REDUCTION_PER_STAGE

      public static final long GRAVITY_REDUCTION_PER_STAGE
      Gravity speed reduction per stage in milliseconds. Stage 1 = 1000 ms, Stage 10 = 1000 - (10 * 60) = 400 ms.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • MINIMUM_GRAVITY_MS

      public static final long MINIMUM_GRAVITY_MS
      Minimum gravity interval (hard floor) in milliseconds. Gravity never drops below this value even at high stages.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BOSS_ANIMATION_INTERVAL_MS

      public static final long BOSS_ANIMATION_INTERVAL_MS
      Boss sprite animation toggle interval in milliseconds. Toggles between frame 0 and frame 1 every 500 ms.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DAMAGE_PER_LINES

      public static final int[] DAMAGE_PER_LINES
      Damage dealt to the boss per line cleared. Index corresponds to number of lines: 1 = 1, 2 = 3, 3 = 5, 4 (Tetris) = 8.

    • SCORE_PER_LINES

      public static final int[] SCORE_PER_LINES
      Score awarded per line cleared. Standard Tetris scoring: 1 line = 100, 2 = 300, 3 = 500, 4 = 800.

    • WINDOW_WIDTH

      public static final int WINDOW_WIDTH
      Window width in pixels.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WINDOW_HEIGHT

      public static final int WINDOW_HEIGHT
      Window height in pixels.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • WINDOW_TITLE

      public static final String WINDOW_TITLE
      Title of the application window.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Method Details

    • getGravityForStage

      public static long getGravityForStage(int stage)
      Calculates the gravity interval (auto-drop speed) for the given stage. Lower stages are slower; higher stages are faster.
      Parameters:
      stage - the current boss stage (1–10)
      Returns:
      gravity interval in milliseconds

    • getDamage

      public static int getDamage(int linesCleared)
      Returns the damage dealt to the boss for the given number of lines cleared.
      Parameters:
      linesCleared - the number of lines cleared (0–4)
      Returns:
      the damage amount

    • getScore

      public static int getScore(int linesCleared)
      Returns the score earned for the given number of lines cleared.
      Parameters:
      linesCleared - the number of lines cleared (0–4)
      Returns:
      the score amount
